thread.title: Mariah Carey & Bryan Tanaka Share A Passionate Kiss In The New Mariah's World Trailer… But Do Things Seem Too Scripted To You?
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey & Bryan Tanaka Share A Passionate Kiss In The New Mariah's World Trailer… But Do Things Seem Too Scripted To You?

author: Perez Hilton
title: Mariah Carey & Bryan Tanaka Share A Passionate Kiss In The New Mariah's World Trailer… But Do Things Seem Too Scripted To You?
text:
1/04/2017 4:40 PM ET | Filed under: TV News • Love Line • Mariah Carey • Reality TV 
New Year. New Mariah. 
Mariah Carey didn't exactly ring in 2017 with the best performance of her career … but that's okay — she's an actress! 
At least, that's what it looks like in the newest teaser for her reality TV show 
Related: Mariah No Longer Working With Creative Director After NYE Fail! 
In the super trailer for the final four episodes of the E! series' debut season, Mimi gets even closer to backup dancer/current boyfriend Bryan Tanaka … even if she was technically still engaged to billionaire James Packer at the time! 
In fact, Bryan and Mariah even share a romantic kiss on the European waterfront — that is, if you can get past the clearly scripted dialogue… 
With that said, the writers still managed to get some good material in there, especially when Bryan straight-up asked Mariah to DTR, questioning: 
"Are you really gonna marry this guy?" 
We knew he was straight, but we had no idea he was that straight-forward! Ha! 
So what did Mariah have to say for herself?? 
"I don't even know anymore… no matter what happens, I'm going to follow my heart." 
Okay. So we kind of already know how it plays out… but it's still fun to see how they got to where they are today! 
Plus, at least she'll always have a career in reality television if the whole singing thing doesn't work out. 
Ch-ch-check out a sneak peek of Mariah 's World 'sTanaka-filled back half (below)!!!
